title: The physician's white coat: Iconic and comforting or likely covered in germs?

title_detail.value: The physician's white coat: Iconic and comforting or likely covered in germs?

summary: A new study has found that although the physicians' white coat is one of the most iconic symbols of the trade, whether or not they wear it, doesn't impact patients' satisfaction.

summary_detail.value: A new study has found that although the physicians' white coat is one of the most iconic symbols of the trade, whether or not they wear it, doesn't impact patients' satisfaction.
